website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-use introductory magic kit for children. Hundreds of different tricks available in the set.
pros: Nice mix of easy and difficult tricks
cons: Quality of parts is lacking, so the kit may not stand up to rough treatment from kids

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my grandson’s 7th birthday. Together we have spent hours watching the dvd and practicing the tricks. This set is so well put together and thought out, I would recommend it highly. Some tricks are a little advanced for him but there are plenty that he can do. He loves to show them to anyone who will watch. When I was considering the purchase, I remembered the cheesy sets from my childhood. This one is so much nicer.
customer_reviews.author: grandmaL

customer_reviews.title: My 12 yr old son just loved this magic set
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old son just loved this magic set. It contained a lot of items that didn't require sleight of hand which made them easy for him to master and he had the stand top to use as a table for his "show". The DVD was also very clear step,by step instructions. Highly recommend this for kids of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad starter kit but instructions are a little hard to follow
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my youngest son got xmas he is 10 and this was one of his favorite gifts. I think he has tested all the tricks. Even before looking at the book. Now I will say the book is a little hard for him to follow. Instructions are a little vague and hard to follow at times but most of the tricks he has come up with a way to do them even if it's not by instruction.
customer_reviews.author: Dracenknights

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old son really loves this kit. ...
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son really loves this kit. Lots of different magic tricks and he has been able to fool several people. He's enjoying learning them and is at the right age to learn about delivery and slight of hand.
customer_reviews.author: Johnessee

customer_reviews.title: We sent the magic kit to our grandson for his ...
customer_reviews.text: We sent the magic kit to our grandson for his 9th birthday and we hearing that it was a hit. Not only with our 9 year old grandson but also with his 10 year old brother and his 6 year old sister.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Goddard

customer_reviews.title: Customer support great!
customer_reviews.text: was missing the DVD and manual. they took care of it right way. :). The kit is just fine for kid first set.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it. As a mom I like the fact ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. As a mom I like the fact that it stores easily and each of the items fits into it's own spot. This will help the kids from losing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Lad87nek

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: You can tell this was well made, everything came intact and perfectly organized in the drawers. The dvd provided helpful tips wich helped especially if you weren’t satisfied with the manual. The magic tricks are of different levels, some easy and other taking a few days of practice. I will say however that the magic cloth that comes with the fake thumb is cheaply made and easily comes apart. Other than that I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Real value magic kit
customer_reviews.text: You should’ve seen my daughters face when she got the package. this is a wonderful magic kit it has a huge variety of tricks she loves the Illusion box and does with it all different tricks. very cute
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 yr old could do these tricks within a few ...
customer_reviews.text: 6 yr old could do these tricks within a few hours; fit the attention span! Other kits did not go over as well. Too complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice kit...lots of variety. Impressive "tricks." NOT kid-ish. Grandson age 11 and Granddaughter age 12 both loved it.
customer_reviews.author: nana of 9

customer_reviews.title: Includes a lot, dvd didnt work
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of pieces, everything great quality! The instruction book is good. We tried the dvd in our xboxone and it didn’t recognize it unfortunately, my son was disappointed since he can’t read the instructions he was looking forward to watching the dvd. We dont have a stand alone dvd player so can’t say if it would work.
customer_reviews.author: Z9z9z9

customer_reviews.title: It sure made my granddaughter happy
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids loved it for a whole day Now it’s in the third floor with the rest of the forgotten toys
customer_reviews.author: barr products

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This is just perfect for my beginning ten year old magician. Most tricks require little to no slight of hand so it's not frustrating for her. This wouldn't be good for someone who's not a beginner - most tricks are easy to figure out. But it allows a beginner to gain skills and build confidence before moving onto something a little more advanced. It includes many tricks, all components, and even instructional videos. My daughter loves that everything has its own storage compartment in its own drawer. Very impressed with this kit!
customer_reviews.author: ChristusG

customer_reviews.title: Mega Magic Tricks Set for Kids
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this magic set for our grandson. He has received hours of fun entertaining family and friends with his new magic tricks.
customer_reviews.author: Rod B

customer_reviews.title: Great starting kit for kids
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 7 year old niece for Christmas and she absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty tricky!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old grandson love to perform tricks. His four year old brother is right there wanting to learn and participate. They have a blast with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki H.

customer_reviews.title: Easy for kids to use
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 9 year old, it comes with a video to teach them how to do the tricks without parents help. It is easy to use, and the kids can do many tricks with this set. My 7 year olds had no problem learning through the videos also.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Let the people know ahead of time if there’s something wrong with the product
customer_reviews.text: A piece was broken and I think there’s some stuff left but nothing important when I tried contacting Customer Care of course we ordered is on back order which was a joke I think you really have to look into this because a customer on satisfaction if people were nice but not understandable when it’s outside The country I would like to say it took me three different times to take care of this couple hours on the phone but that means nothing but one side gets paid the other one just frustrated
customer_reviews.author: bruce

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: What looked promising was highly disappointing. Peices broke within 5 minutes of opening the package and not because of rough play. The wand was broken before even touching. Instructions were clear for the useable pieces.
customer_reviews.author: A. Laue

customer_reviews.title: Great set for my 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves doing magic tricks. This set had allot of basic tricks that she could learn. Never used the instructional dvd as they had YouTube vids for her to watch which was much better.
customer_reviews.author: TheRon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Magic Set
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome magic set! I got it for my son for his 7th birthday. We were having a good time with it. Some of the tricks will easily make you wonder how they did that 😂. Of course though little ones love to show you how they did the tricks. Comes with a DVD and book and good amount of props!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The videos are helpful, there’s a lot of tricks to fool around with, and many of them set littles up for success (mine is 9 yo). My only complaint is that a couple of them broke right away, but there are still plenty left to play with. Fun party tricks!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely enjoyed by my 7 year old nephew! Some tricks he could figure out on his own, some were easily learned with the instruction dvd, some were a little more detailed and needed a bit of practice. Heavy duty cardboard houses 2 drawer inserts that have a place to hold each item securely.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: Magic for kids
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present for my 8 year old grandson. It has a lot of various tricks and they are well packaged. He doesn’t have any problem reading and following the instructions. He was very excited to get the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lynn Battles

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the kit. Great Support
customer_reviews.text: I had to contact support for replacement parts and they were very quick to resolve the issue. Also, kids are enjoying the kit. A great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our 9 year old grandson for his birthday. He loved it!

customer_reviews.title: My kids absolutely love it. It has a bunch of beginner tricks
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love it. It has a bunch of beginner tricks. The tricks themselves are awesome, but the DVD presenter is pretty monotone and boring when presenting the magic.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Powers

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: My 9year old asked for a Magic Box. Best thing he l opened on Christmas. He loves it, plays with it almost everyday. Its nice size. Sturdy pieces. The outer box is hard enough for restoring items.

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this package. Hes 11 and had this as a christmas gift and still plays with it today.

customer_reviews.title: a great set for kids
customer_reviews.text: a great set for kids, easy to use, clear instructions on how to do each trick. it also comes with a dvd that shows the tricks in action. each trick is made out of quality materials. my kids had a lot of fun practicing and showing off the tricks. it is a great value for the price

customer_reviews.title: Magic made fun but easy to understand.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old grandson is already astounding his friends with his magic ability after one week. Easy to understand instructions.

customer_reviews.title: I would have preferred a little better quality for the price tho

customer_reviews.title: A great magic kit for kids to learn and have fun with.

This kit comes with an easy to follow instruction booklet with pictures so it has been easy for him to learn these tricks. I highly recommend this magic kit , it’s a great way for children to expand their knowledge and express themselves and have fun showing off their skills.

product_meta.title: Mega Magic Kit for Kids. Perform Hundreds Today's Most Exciting Tricks. Magic Set with Instructional DVD
feature_bullets: ULTIMATE KIDS MAGIC SET - Let your child be the star with 28 magic props allowing your child to perform hundreds of tricks with this ultimate magic set for kids, the largest selection of magic tricks on the market.

STEP BY STEP MAGICAL INSTRUCTIONS - Your children will be able to perform magic in no time and wow you with their magic tricks with step-by-step instructional dvd from the Master Magician Leif Davis plus an easy to follow instruction manual included

PERFECT GIFT FOR YOUR YOUNG MAGICIAN - Includes different levels of tricks so your child won’t get bored as they delight in amazing their audiences and put on a spectacular magic show. Perfect magic starter kit, for endless hours of imaginative play

MADE OF THE HIGHEST QUALITY – This magic wand set is made of the best quality materials including a 2 drawer magic performance table for easy storage. Simply add the words, “abracadabra” and “presto chango” and enjoy as your childs fun begins

RISK-FREE - All of our products have our 30-day return policy which means your child can experience their new magic set completely risk-free. Let them show off their new magic skills with one of the most complete magic sets ever made

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars467 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
